Wisdom: اسْتَدِيمُوا الذِّكْرَ فَإِنَّهُ يُنِيرُ الْقَلْبَ وَهُوَ أَفْضَلُ الْعِبَادَةِ
enWisdom: Be constant in your remembrance [of Allah] for it illuminates the heart and is surely the best [form of] worship
Through the constant remembrance of Allah, heedlessness is dispelled
Constant remembrance [of Allah] illuminates the heart and mind
The tongue of a virtuous person is enthralled by the continued remembrance of Allah

Wisdom: مَنْ عَمَرَ قَلْبَهُ بِدَوَامِ الذِّكْرِ حَسُنَتْ أَفْعَالُهُ فِي السِّرِّ وَالْجَهْرِ
enWisdom: Whoever fills his heart with the constant remembrance of Allah, his actions become good [both] in secret and in the open
One whose remembrance [of Allah] increases, his mind becomes illuminated
Constant remembrance [of Allah] is the quality of the friends [of Allah]

Wisdom: مُدَاوَمَةُ الذِّكْرِ قُوتُ الْأَرْوَاحِ وَمِفْتَاحُ‏ الصَّلَاحِ
enWisdom: The constant remembrance [of Allah] is nourishment for the souls and the key to righteousness
